title: Save the date: Google I/O is May 20-21, 2025.
description: The countdown to Google I/O begins now! Join us live on May 20 and 21 from Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View and online at io.google. At I/O, you’ll learn more abo…
excerpt: The countdown to Google I/O begins now! Join us live on May 20 and 21 from Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View and online at io.google. At I/O, you’ll learn more about Google’s newest products, technologies, and innovations in AI, Android and more. We’ll start day one with keynotes, followed by sessions, demos, networking opportunities and more continuing on day two. Register now and check out last year’s announcements from I/O 2024 for a refresher.
text: The countdown to Google I/O begins now! Join us live on May 20 and 21 from Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View and online at io.google. At I/O, you’ll learn more about Google’s newest products, technologies, and innovations in AI, Android and more. We’ll start day one with keynotes, followed by sessions, demos, networking opportunities and more continuing on day two. Register now and check out last year’s announcements from I/O 2024 for a refresher.
html:
The countdown to Google I/O begins now! Join us live on May 20 and 21 from Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View and online at io.google. At I/O, you’ll learn more about Google’s newest products, technologies, and innovations in AI, Android and more.

We’ll start day one with keynotes, followed by sessions, demos, networking opportunities and more continuing on day two. Register now and check out last year’s announcements from I/O 2024 for a refresher.
